app.cards.game

Interface HandValue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Flush, FullHouse, NOfAKind, Straight

    public interface HandValue
    This interface represents any assortment of Cards that have showdown value. By default it requires nothing but the implementing class to offer a method getCards() to expose a Collection of its cards.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<Card> getCards()
      A Collection of all Cards of this HandValue

    • Method Detail

      • getCards

        java.util.Collection<Card> getCards()
        A Collection of all Cards of this HandValue
        Returns:
        All Cards whose combination constitutes this specific HandValue
